page.title: 09A FINZEAN SCHOOLGIRL'S DAY
page.content: I get up at half past seven and dress in a green and white checked, cotton, knee-length frock with white nylon ankle socks and trainers.At 8.00 I eat my breakfast of Frosties,a cereal made from sugar-frosted flakes of corn, followed by a cup of tea.At 8.30 I walk down to the road to catch the school taxi. Every morning we take{weather readings and during the morning we may do{Maths and read.After 15 mins. playtime we may write stories,reports or a helpful exercise.Lunchtime might be followed by{Environmental Studies}e.g. Explorers which we do partly from a computer program. At home I play on my bike or swing.
